name: Apple
wishText:
On this day of love and celebration, I want to express how incredibly grateful I am to have you in my life. You bring sweetness and joy to every moment, just like your namesake fruit. Your kindness, warmth, and unwavering support mean everything to me. 
 With each passing day, my love for you grows stronger, deeper, and more enduring. You are the core of my happiness, the seed of my dreams, and the sunshine that brightens my world. 
 Today, I want to remind you of the beauty you possess, inside and out. Your grace, intelligence, and compassion are unparalleled, making you not just my valentine, but my inspiration and my heart's truest desire. 
  Let's cherish every moment together, today and always. Happy Valentine's Day, my beloved Apple.
